title: Kevin Griffin - 21st Century Background Services with Azure Logic Apps and Azure Functions
description:
This is a recording of the May 13, 2020 virtual meeting

21st Century Background Services with Azure Logic Apps and Azure Functions

How do you handle "background tasks" in your applications? Maybe you build a cronjob or a Windows service to execute some code on a schedule? Maybe you have a background task in your web application?

No matter what you're doing, you are probably building infrastructure to support these background tasks. That can be costly, unreliable, and difficult to debug.

In this presentation, you will be offered an alternative approach to building background services by taking advantage of Azure Logic Apps and Azure Functions. You see real-world scenarios that were implemented and that are running right now!

SPEAKER BIO
Kevin Griffin is an author, teacher, mentor, and consultant focusing in software development. He is also a 10-time Microsoft MVP, specializing in ASP.NET and web development. As the owner of Swift Kick, a software training and services company, Kevin specializes in helping businesses push their technology stacks into the 21st century. You can often find Kevin speaking at conferences and user groups across the country or blogging at http://kevgriffin.com. In his spare time, Kevin is the co-host of the popular 2 Frugal Dudes podcast.
